Package jol.types.operator

Class Summary
AntiScanJoin An AntiScanJoin operator is the forms basis of the 'notin' operator.
Assign<C extends Comparable<C>> An Assign operator assigns some constant value to some attribute position in the input tuples.
EventFilter Event predicates can contain constant values in the list of arguments.
Function Applies a table function operator to the input stream.
IndexJoin An index join uses an index to reduce the number of tuples scanned along the inner table.
Join The interface to all join operators.
Operator This class represents the interface extended by all operators in the system.
Operator.OperatorTable The operator table stores all operator objects used by programs installed in the runtime.
Projection A Projection operator "projects" the input tuples onto a subset of attributes defined by the given predicate (head) schema.
RemoteBuffer A RemoteBuffer takes the input tuples and inserts them into the NetworkBuffer.
ScanJoin The ScanJoin operator joins the input tuples with some table along some set of common variable names.
Selection Selection operator applies a selection predicate to the input tuples sending any tuples that pass the predicate to the output tuple set.
Watch Watch operators print the input tuples to some PrintStream before passing the same set of tuples to the output.
 

Enum Summary
Operator.OperatorTable.Field Operator fields.
Watch.Modifier The type of watches that exist in the system.
